Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2007 08:35PM AnnBrown wrote: I also have had two bouts of cellulitis, but have not had a diagnosis of lymphedema.  I am going to ask my onc about this, though.  I feel sure the cellulitis (both times on my modified mast side of my chest). I just got out of the hospital a week ago, and thank goodness, I recognized the symptoms of cellulitis before it progressed as badly as it did the first time.  I am on a few weeks of antibiotics now. Ann
